Orb of Atlantis

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 375
magic bonus [boosters]: +W
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #913 Friendly Currents
spell [itemspell]: #732 Summon Lesser Water Elemental
leadership (magic) [ldr-m]: +10
water breathing [giftofwater]: self + total size 200

Requires 25W5E to forge (W4E1)

This crystal sphere grants its owner the ability to lead one hundred men into the sea and lets him control water currents to hamper the movement of enemy soldiers. Finally, it also gives the owner the power to summon and lead small water elementals.
